text: Georg Riedel may refer to: * Georg Riedel (Altstadt Kantor) (1676–1738) Kantor at the Altstadt church, Königsberg, who composed oratorios of Gospel of Matthew and Revelation * Georg Riedel (jazz musician) (born 1934), composer of music for Astrid Lindgren movies * Georg Riedel (glass manufacturer), Austrian wine glass manufacturer ** Georg Josef Riedel (born 1949), 10th-generation owner of Riedel
title: Georg Riedel
